short_summary: IT Business Consultant services including informatics and digital modernization

full_summary:
# Government of Canada Tender Announcement: IT Business Consultant Level 3

## Table of Contents

* [Tender Details](#tender-details)
* [Description](#description)
* [Contract Details](#contract-details)
* [Contact Information](#contact-information)
* [Attachments](#attachments)

## Tender Details

- **Reference Number:** PW-22-01016138
- **Solicitation Number:** 24062-23-238
- **Publication Date:** 2022-12-06
- **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-21T14:00:00 (Expired)
- **Procurement Category:** Services - Skills and Learning (SRV)
- **Procurement Method:** Selective Tendering - Competitive Bid or Request for Proposal

## Description

The Treasury Board Secretariat (TBS) is seeking the services of IT Business Consultants, Level 3 to support the development of new Government of Canada (GC)-wide Information Management and Information Technology (IM/IT) programs and services. The requirement is intended to result in the award of one contract, with a maximum term of three years, including one year plus two irrevocable one-year options.

## Contract Details

The contract shall be governed by the terms and conditions of the standing offers and shall be awarded on the basis of a competitive select tender process. The end user entities for this contract are the Treasury Board of Canada.

## Contact Information

- **Name:** Brigitte Gonga
- **Email:** [Brigitte.Gonga@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:Brigitte.Gonga@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** 618-218-6635
